snippet: David Risher, a former Amazon executive, has gradually found acceptance for Worldreader, the nonprofit he founded to bring e-books to Africa.
abstract: David Risher, a former Amazon executive, has gradually found acceptance for Worldreader, the nonprofit he founded to bring e-books to Africa.

headline.main: Publishers Back African Literacy Effort With E-Books
headline.print_headline: E-Books to Africa At No Charge
